tool_description: Football, Soccer live scores, highlights, game recaps, fouls, and post-match interviews on a global scale, providing developers with comprehensive sports data. Integrate pre-match game odds seamlessly into your projects for a complete sports data solution.
name: Football Highlights API
title: Football Highlights API

api_list.name: FootballBookmakersController_getBookmakers
api_list.description: Retrieve a list of all bookmakers based on passed query parameters.

totalCount.description: Available number of items, relevant to the provided query.

message.description: Explanation message regarding your current tier.

api_list.name: TeamsController_getTeamById
api_list.description: Retrieve team details by team id.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://football-highlights-api.p.rapidapi.com/teams/5700782"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "football-highlights-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://football-highlights-api.p.rapidapi.com/teams/{id}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "football-highlights-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: HighlightsController_getHighlights
api_list.description: Retrieve a list of all highlights.

optional_parameters.name: date
optional_parameters.description: Date that follows the YYYY-MM-DD format.

optional_parameters.name: countryCode
optional_parameters.description: Country code specified by the ISO 3166 standard.

url.description: Url location of the video highlight.

code.description: Country code specified by the ISO 3166 standard.

current.description: Home - Away score up to penalties.

penalties.description: Home - Away team score after the penalties phase.

totalCount.description: Available number of items, relevant to the provided query.

message.description: Explanation message regarding your current tier.

api_list.name: TeamsController_getTeams
api_list.description: Retrieve a list of all teams.

totalCount.description: Available number of items, relevant to the provided query.

message.description: Explanation message regarding your current tier.
